title: 'Mad Men' star Christina Hendricks splits from husband Geoffrey Arend after 10 years
text:
CLOSE They made us fall head over heels, then they broke our hearts. A previous version of this video misidentified Jenna Dewan. USA TODAY

Christina Hendricks and husband Geoffrey Arend are calling it quits.

The "Mad Men" star, 44, and her actor husband, 41, announced on their respective Instagram accounts Thursday that they are divorcing after 10 years of marriage.

"Twelve years ago we fell in love and became partners. We joined our two amazing families, had countless laughs, made wonderful friends and were blessed with incredible opportunities," the pair wrote in a joint statement posted to social media. "Today we take our next step together, but on separate paths. We will always be grateful for the love we’ve shared."

'You have to evolve':Christina Hendricks applauds female focus of 'Toy Story 4'

The couple's announcement comes less than a week after their 10th wedding anniversary on Oct. 11. Neither Hendricks nor Arend, who currently stars on the CBS series "Madam Secretary," acknowledged the occasion on social media.

Hendricks was even spotted without her wedding ring at the 10th Annual Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic in California leading up to their anniversary.

Geoffrey Arend and Christina Hendricks have called it quits. (Photo: Dimitrios Kambouris, Getty Images for Brooks Brothers)

"We will be taking time to rediscover ourselves in this transition and we thank you for your patience and support in giving us the space to do so," their statement said.

Hendricks and Arend added that they "will always work together to raise our two beautiful dogs." They don't have any children.

Hendricks' rep said she would have no further comment. USA TODAY reached out to Arend's rep.

A day before announcing their split, Hendricks reflected on happier times with a epic throwback picture of their past Halloween costume together.

"My proudest costume moment to date...Ladies and Gentlemen, Nosferatu and wolf man. I did all this makeup myself including the bald cap!" she wrote.
